name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicRectangularLargeImage
desc: A template for displaying a large rectangle containing header text and an image.

items.name: init(textProvider: CLKTextProvider, imageProvider: CLKFullColorImageProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template with a text provider and an image provider.

items.name: var textProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The header text to display in the complication.
